Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2025-11-11

## Active Technologies
- JSON files in `/src/assets/` (e.g., `commercial-items-data-flow.json`, `domains.json`, `services.json`) (002-domain-aliases)

- TypeScript 5.9.2 with Angular 20.3.0 + Angular 20.3.0, RxJS 7.8.0, D3.js 7.9.0 (for data flow visualization), Analog.js Vite Plugin (002-domain-aliases)
